metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23518 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: rails-html-sanitizer is responsible for sanitizing HTML fragments in Rails applications. Versions >= 1.0.3, < 1.4.4 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting via data URIs when used in combination with Loofah >= 2.1.0. This issue is patched in version 1.4.4.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-html-sanitizer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
